GSD.description:
Revert "Revert "block, bfq: honor already-setup queue merges""

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 4083925bd6dc89216d156474a8076feec904e607. For more details please see the references link.
